channel.title: What is everyone's favorite synth combo?
channel.description: Mine is Punch (Original) and Silk (7 Skies). What is yours? Is it a bass + lead? Lead + pad? What sounds the best in your opinion? <3

item.title: What is everyone's favorite synth combo?
item.dc:creator: DHO
item.description:
Agreed. For my favorite ambient songs I’ve done I usually go for hour to do the chords. Same as your settings but with max reverb. Lake is the best bass for ambient in my opinion.

item.title: What is everyone's favorite synth combo?
item.dc:creator: _undefined
item.description:
I use so many layering ideas, it’s really hard to choose. But… i do have one favorite:

Silk
Strain
Otter (low volume)
Gossip (tone up all the way)

It gives a nice progressive house “supersaw” kind of thing.

Read full topic

item.title: What is everyone's favorite synth combo?
item.dc:creator: IAATOE
item.description:
Dust and globe go well together if you have them playing at the same time. Globe should be kept as it comes and dust should have max distortion and three quarter filter. The result is a nice trap kick.

Read full topic

item.title: What is everyone's favorite synth combo?
item.dc:creator: endm-usa
item.description:
I don’t really have one, but I love using Hour with the tone all the way up and the filter a little less than halfway. It’s great for ambient productions.
